titles.title: No CCP Financial Apps on Government Devices Act
No CCP Financial Apps on Government Devices Act

To prohibit Government phones from using any financial service application owned or operated, directly or indirectly, by the Chinese Communist Party or any member of such Party, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
No CCP Financial Apps on Government Devices Act
This bill directs the Office of Management and Budget to develop standards and guidelines requiring the removal of certain financial service applications connected to China from the information technology of executive agencies.
Specifically, this applies to an application (1) domiciled in a jurisdiction controlled by the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), or (2) if an entity domiciled in a jurisdiction controlled by the CCP has at least a 10% voting interest.
The bill makes exceptions, including for law enforcement.
